alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jasper, Smith and southeastern Scott Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burns, or 8 miles northwest of Raleigh, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Raleigh and Burns around 610 PM CDT. Homewood around 625 PM CDT. Pineville around 635 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi.
